text: Yesli zhe tvoy narod (o Mukhammad!) schitayet tebya lzhetsom, to ved' i prezhde narody, byvshiye do nikh, schitali svoikh poslannikov lzhetsami. K nim prikhodili poslanniki s yasnymi znameniyami, so svitkami Gospodnimi i s Knigoy, osveshchayushchey put' k spaseniyu v blizhayshey zhizni i v zhizni budushchey
